Reviews.Title: wonderful photo shot
Reviews.Author: summer
Reviews.Content: It's a nice, cute, easy-to-carry camera, very convenient to carry around and take beautiful pics. I bought it a week before thanksgiving when there's a discount, so the price is fairly good. Though it's not a professional camera, it's still a wonderful choice for non-pros to take nice pics, the color of these pics are pretty and the quality very good as well. I would suggest first learners to purchase this camera and it definitely won't disappoint you!I've carried this camera for a short trip to NY city and  taken several hundreds of pics. one suggestions is to get two memory cards and another battery for this camera. Then your trip will be definitely a recordable one :)

Reviews.Title: Best little big thing ever!!
Reviews.Author: Hb
Reviews.Content: Great on every level. Would recommend the viewfinder if you will be taking lots of sun outdoor shots. Skip the flash its rarely needed and get the wide angle lens!!

ProductInfo.Features:
16.1 MP APS-C Size HD Sensor
Uses Sony E-mount Lenses
Full 1080 HD 60p/60i/24p Movie Capture
3.0" 180º Tilt-able Touchscreen LCD
Wi-Fi® sharing and downloadable camera apps
Fast Hybrid Autofocus
PlayMemories Camera and Mobile Apps
Intuitive Interface with Control Dial
Low Light Performance up to ISO 25600
Includes 18-55mm F/3.5-5.6 Zoom Lens
ProductInfo.Name: Sony NEX-5RK/WQ 16.1 MP Compact Interchangeable Lens Digital Camera with 18-55mm Lenses (White)
